website_summaries.verdict: This machine's disco lights get plenty of attention, but the real star is the Bluetooth connectivity, which gives you access to thousands of songs.
pros: Takes center stage with 54 LED disco lights
Comes with one microphone, but two wired jacks are available
Scroll lyrics to your TV using RCA cables
Plays music using CD player or Bluetooth
Record performances or play to a device
Keep track of song tracks with two-digit LED display
cons: Power adapter plug on the back of the machine breaks off relatively easily

customer_reviews.title: Good machine for the price. I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. A few neat features, (USB, Bluetooth, CD/CDG capability). Ability to plug into a tv to get the words on the screen (with CDG), fun lights, 2 microphone capability, and auto voice control. Feels a little cheap, microphones can overdrive a bit, and the volume is not super loud, but All in all it was a good deal if it continues to work for a long time as it does out of the box. See my video for a more complete review. I will apologize in advance for the amateur nature of the video, and my lousy singing. :) NOTE: My video won't upload. I think it's too big?? Will try again at some point. Sorry...
customer_reviews.author: review-meister

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: When I initially got it in the mail, I was worried it would be broken from being transported. So even though it is a Christmas gift, I opened it to ensure nothing was wrong. I bought it for my 7 year old sister, and I guarantee she WILL LOVE IT! The machine works perfectly (as far as I could tell) and the sound quality is great! I give this item a 5 star, but they really outdid themselves for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Barela

customer_reviews.title: Can you hear me now?  No!
customer_reviews.text: Glad I am testing this thing out before Christmas. There is no way to hear the voice from the microphone. As a former audio engineer, I have a pretty good knowledge of how to turn knobs for volume control and hook up a mic. If one person puts their mouth on the mic while singing and the other puts an ear right up to the speaker, you can faintly hear that something is coming from the mic. What a piece of junk. Hope Amazon will give me a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Livi Liv

customer_reviews.title: Miserable product and miserable customer service
customer_reviews.text: This stupid machine has not worked since the day we got it. I bought this for Christmas for my daughter. The machine will not recognize a cdg disc and hasn't worked since the day we got it. I have been in a loop with the Singing Machine customer service and they will not resolve and have been less than helpful trying to get this defective machine replaced. I am at the point of just throwing this $40 away and starting over. This is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Power Connector Broke
customer_reviews.text: This singing machine has a female DC power connector on the back. It's the kind with the round power connector like you find on laptops, small televisions, and many other electronics. The female power connector on the machine was poorly soldered and broke off after 5 months of use. Now it's totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: Cramsey

customer_reviews.title: This product is poor
customer_reviews.text: This is the second version of this product we have purchased - both have suffered the same flaw - the power adapter plug breaks where it connects to the back of the machine. This product is poor quality
customer_reviews.author: S Hemmings

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH FUN!!
customer_reviews.text: My child loves to sing and this was the perfect gift!!!! For sure spend the extra $10 and get the Bluetooth version of this! Pair your machine to your device and sing the night away. Use YouTube to get music with lyrics, no need to buy CD. I use Chromecast to view iPad on my big TV! Such an great time for all the family.
customer_reviews.author: Treemg

customer_reviews.title: It was a fun little device while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: The place where you plug in the cord broke off after very little use. It was a fun little device while it lasted, but without power, it's pretty useless.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Luce

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I bought this item based on the good reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item less than 3 months ago and my daughter has used it TWICE , I actually went to use it with her tonight and the top had just broke off and now won't even play a CD. I feel like I bought this item based on the good reviews and feel I got a junk one. This being the 3rd time for us to use it shouldn't have broken off like that, it was wobbly when we opened it, but still played a CD. I'm wondering who I need to speak to, to have this one replaced....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was great while it was working
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe it happened to me (and the kids). Despite the reviews that stated the power plug in the back broke, I thought it would not happen to us. Well, it did. By the second day it was dead and the power plug in the back was obviously loose. Its a shame, a little bit of a stronger construction for the plug and this unit would have all 5's. It was great while it was working.
customer_reviews.author: CKP

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Last Two Times!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these for my granddaughter and she loved it. However, it didn't last but about 6 months and it quit working. She loved it so much i ordered her another one and it stopped working after a couple of months. I would not recommend this brand. I would look for something else. I wasted a lot of money!
customer_reviews.author: NGlass

customer_reviews.title: piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This thing broke almost immediately. The power cord that connects to the back of the system fell out and is not fixable. Would not buy again. It's a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Christy M.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work after a couple months!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe it! We literally only used it a handful of times and it will no longer turn on anymore! I would like my money back and all the money I spent on cds and accessories but I don't know how to contact seller! This is garbage please do NOT waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: WiscoLove1

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last 6 months was a Christmas present. Their warranty is only for 90 days. Wish I had known before I purchased this product it just tells me the company doesn't believe in their product either if they won't at least warranty their product for a year. Machine quit taking on power.
customer_reviews.author: TXJuliet

customer_reviews.title: Bad power jack
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first few weeks. Less than a month after Santa brought it, it's dead. The port where the power cable plugs in is cracked. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: amanda23

customer_reviews.title: IF ADDING YOUR OWN MUSIC  USB DRIVE NEEDS TO BE FORMATTED TO WORK CORRECTLY
customer_reviews.text: The version of this machine with a usb drive was having problems when I was using a usb drive. I put MP4 files on it and it did not work but then I added MP3 files and removed the mp4 files of my own on a USB drive and those worked correctly after I correctly formatted the drive. I'm adding a couple screenshots of how it finally started to work. BTW im running Mac OS Catalina 10.15.1.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Brantner

customer_reviews.title: Short life span
customer_reviews.text: First of all it doesn't even have a radio on it. Second, My daughter had this for 4 months and now it's broken!! The wires for the power cord fell into the machine and now there is no way to get power to it.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Defective right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: It just blinks. Won't play CDs. Won't pair with Bluetooth. Useless and such a bummer for my daughter to open a Christmas present that doesn't work. Crossing my fingers the replacement one will function.
customer_reviews.author: KayDeeVee

customer_reviews.title: barely usable
customer_reviews.text: It looks cool, but the performance is terrible. It plays the CD+G's fine, but once you start sining along, the sound from the CD cuts out. You have to have the mic almost in your mouth for it to pick up any sound from singing. We have played with the auto voice control and mic volume in different variants and no luck. It's for the kids, so they don't know any better, but if you were purchasing this for anyone older than 10, they will be quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: gary assassin

customer_reviews.title: Easy for kids to use
customer_reviews.text: This karaoke machine is awesome! The sound is great, the lights are so cool, and it's so easy that my 6-year-old and 4-year-old can easily use it! The microphone that comes with it is good, but the "recommended" microphone that you can buy to complete the dual mic is even better (the all black one).
customer_reviews.author: ObieOneTwo

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work!
customer_reviews.text: CD player didn't work. And Blu-tooth didn't work. So basically just a fancy microphone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would probably buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price! Bought for my three year old twins and they love it. Bought the extra microphone to go with it so they wouldn't have to share. The microphones slide down these little holders on the side and the first day we had it, a screw came out so the holder won't work. (Can totally be replaced, but was slightly annoyed considering we had owned it a total of two hours). Overall good product. The blue tooth quality isn't the best (the music goes in and out a bit) but I do enjoy the fact that I can hook up my iPod to it. If you are strictly using the CDs, the sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: LUCY GLOVER

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and works great!
customer_reviews.text: This karaoke machine works great with awesome sound quality! The square base makes it sturdy, but is a bit tall in height (easy for little ones to pull over w/ cords). It has introverted handles on the sides. It works with cds (top loaded) or audio input(back) and very handy having a second microphone input and handle, even though it only comes with one; we saved an old microphone from our girls’ Frozen machine and use it as a secondary for two singers. The lights are dimmable and sound is easily dialed up or down on a large dial. Our family loves having karaoke nights!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Onken

customer_reviews.title: Sad Christmas Don't but it
customer_reviews.text: Broken item brand new. Horrible. We have tried and tried to get this to work. Never worked from day one. This has a short in the mic and a wire hanging out in the back. We wish this would have been a great present for Christmas but instead it was a great disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: Not a Great Device
customer_reviews.text: Setup easy. Sound quality not good. Could barely hear the device in and open room. Had to return it to provider. Must say the return was easy without any hassle. Would not purchase this particular one again.
customer_reviews.author: Dewdrop2

customer_reviews.title: and we had a great time playing with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad's Christmas present, and we had a great time playing with it! My dad is a tech-savvy guy and already had a pretty intense tv/audio setup in his living room, so he was able to plug it in and dive in easily. Someone without that knowledge base or existing setup might take a bit longer but I really don't think it was that complicated. Added bonus: the lights memorized the young kids in the family, so they sat and stared at the lights while the rest of us sang and had a blast. I definitely recommend this as a fun gift.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.  Poor quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this karaoke machine for my granddaughter last Christmas. It had intermittent trouble with sound in the beginning and finally stopped working after just weeks. I contacted the company by phone and they told me they would replace the machine if I produced proof of purchase through an email link, which I promptly provided. I didn’t hear back from them. After several weeks, I sent an email asking the status and never heard from them again. I DO NOT recommend this company. Very disappointed in their lack of communication and follow through in standing behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: CD Player Broken
customer_reviews.text: Sucks, CD player won't play discs-- had to return. Microphone works well but the CD player wouldn't read the disc and that was a huge downer for my daughter's birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Died After Four Months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter, for Christmas. It was opened and LOVED on Dec. 25. Exactly three months later - late March - the volume stopped working. I found that if I held the volume knob at the far end, I'd get crackly sound, but otherwise silence. I emailed the manufacturer to ask about a warranty replacement. The representative emailed me back and said this product comes with a three month warranty, and too bad. I'm not happy at all, with the end result, though your mileage may vary. It was good while it lasted - for three months.
customer_reviews.author: Double E

customer_reviews.title: It works!  And its only $35!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a Christmas present. Great price on a toy for the kids. I tested it out and it works just fine. Bought the extra Mic. The machine has 2 mic holders on the sides. It's a toy....not a professional machine. You get what you pay for IMO. But this will provide hours of entertainment for the kids and adults. Don't expect the same quality as machines that cost over $100. It's worth $35 IMO
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughters Love This!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Singing Machine we have purchased. The first was for a granddaughter, turning 7. She and her brothers love it and have so much fun. When another granddaughter was celebrating her birthday a few months later, it was a "no brainer" to purchase another machine. She and her sister are having a great time with it. It is easy to use and provides hours and hours of fun and entertainment
customer_reviews.author: Joanie K

customer_reviews.title: The Singing Machine
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my granddaughter. It included CD with songs on it and a free download. It operated so well that her parents now use it as well. It is easily connected to the television so you can see the words. The delivery time was very prompt and left at the front door. They are very happy with this and will send me videos of the little girl singing. You can also buy another microphone and do duets. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Donald M. Stys

customer_reviews.title: wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: lasted about 3 months - then it quit reading CD's - just after warranty ended
customer_reviews.author: Deanne

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth access is nice
customer_reviews.text: Product came as described and was reasonably priced. Bluetooth setup was easy and sounded good. Unfortunately The speaker rattles, even though I turned volume to 5 and balance was adjusted. the auto voice control returns voice when using song that has that option. The echo, disco lights, Mic volume and CD player works. I ordered an additional singing machine mic which also sounds good. Unfortunately no usb on this unit, I thought I picked one with usb, CD, and Bluetooth, it was noticed after the purchase, and tried to cancel before it was shipped to order one with Bluetooth and usb option but was unsuccessful.
customer_reviews.author: llofita

customer_reviews.title: It is also pretty bulky.
customer_reviews.text: The CD player did not work! I got it as a present for my sister and could not return it as 30 days had passed before she told me it was broken when it arrived. It is also pretty bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia I

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: You can use it for karaoke, or as a Bluetooth speaker to just play music on. I tend to connect my phone and let a playlist run while cleaning. And of course, I’ll pick up the mic every now and then for a sing-along. It’s small and lightweight so I’ve also taken it on the road to parties. You can buy the cds or use a karaoke list on YouTube. Or, save your songs to a playlist and have at it! Great for family fun.
customer_reviews.author: T&S Stanley

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time is a charm
customer_reviews.text: It took 2 tries to get one that worked. First one we ordered (for Christmas!) had a non-working CD player. The speaker and mic worked and the kids had a blast singing... we just couldn't use any of the karaoke CD's we bought. I sent it back right after Christmas and ordered another one right away. The 2nd one is working fine and plays our karaoke CD's. For the price, it's hard to beat watching the kids have that much fun. I hope it lasts a while.
customer_reviews.author: Gatorforester

customer_reviews.title: My kids had fun with it a few times
customer_reviews.text: My kids had fun with it a few times. They love talking I tot he microphone. The problem is the cheap cardboard backing. The machine stopped getting power after only those few uses. I was hopeful that a wife pulled out of a connection, but when I opened it up I foound that the power plugged right into a control board. The connector ripped off and it is now useless. I wish the designers would have wired the connection in instead because my kids would still be having fun with this. I would recommend you look into a different machine if you want to have it for more than a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible PRODUCT. Stopped working in less than a year!!
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE PRODUCT!!! DID NOT LAST A YEAR. I bought this karaoke machine last August in anticipation of my Halloween party. We used it and it worked fine it said on the Shelf for about a year and out of nowhere it no longer reads CDs and does not work. I went online and there is no product support to address this issue. I'm very disappointed that I cannot even exchange it or get my money back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Karaoke for My Boy
customer_reviews.text: This inexpensive Karaoke Machine is great for my 9-year-old son. We can Bluetooth our phone to play lyric videos from YouTube or to play audio from Amazon Music (or iTunes, Spotify, or Pandora). And we son can hook the machine to the family TV using component video cables (included), and display lyrics from Karaoke CDs on the TV. I would highly recommend a second microphone, since your child will want to sing with siblings or friends.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Albers

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS - IT IS JUNK
customer_reviews.text: I RARELY give negative reviews but this company produces really defective machines and does not stand behind them (their warranty is only 90 days). This machine did not even last a year. Initially, I thought it was just that we had a defective one, but then we saw friends who also had it and theirs had similarly broken very quickly. I called customer support and spoke with Jackie, who was completely unhelpful - just suggesting we purchase additional products to try to trouble-shoot it. I am extremely disappointed in this company, it is disappointing for our children and is just putting more cheap, plastic junk into the planet, so I want to let other customers know to BEWARE. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: EBW

customer_reviews.title: what a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter birthday-it stopped working after 6 months with only very occasional use. Very annoying, what a waste of money 😑 do yourself a favor and don’t buy this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kat22

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my little girls birthday. She likes it, but the quality could be better. The sound is pitiful. You can hear the mic decently, but the music is barely audible. My 3 year old doesn’t care too much so it’s still a decent gift. But it’s not great for anyone else who wants to use it. I bought 2 cordless mice to go with it and they are much better than the one that came with it. I just really wish the music would play louder. Even when you are using it to just listen to music it isn’t very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Townsend

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan of this product. Volume is very low. Just playing a CD and volume all the way up, not that loud. Start using a Mic and volume goes down. Add a second Mic and you can barely here tthe music. I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for christmas. right out of the box I guess the mic 1 port wasnt working, but my daughter said she was fine with just using the second mic port so we didn't return it. it hasnt even been 6 months and now the microphone has quit working. the lights are nice and she likes the machine so we bought another mic for it. but i wouldnt recommend this to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Yo Mama

customer_reviews.title: Karaoke Fun For The Whole Family!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Christmas gift. Works well. Loud! Microphone can overmodulate if too loud. Lights are fun and everything works as described. Easy hook up to TV using rca video out cable. We purchased several Karaoke CD's and an extra microphone for Duets! Hours of fun for you children. Sturdy and well made. 4 Stars. Would Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John Gale

customer_reviews.title: No Demo CD Included
customer_reviews.text: The product information doesn’t clearly state it but this does not include a demo CD. The reviews and questions/answers stated that it did, but it does not.
customer_reviews.author: slmr

customer_reviews.title: Mic worked after a couple seconds.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter opened this up on Xmas this morning, i hooked it up for her and the mic worked after 2 seconds and that was it. Mic stopped working. all you hear is crackling sounds. Sending it back. What a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: I'd consider buying a second time...
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I almost didnt buy this, but bought the protection plan as well to be safe. We have owned it about two months now and it still works great. This is not a professional karaoke machine by any means, however, this is perfect for my 11 year old singer and her friends! This will last if it is taken care of just like anything else you buy online.
customer_reviews.author: N. Belling

customer_reviews.title: Not well made.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so excited to get this. We loved the fun party lights. Little disappointed that there are no other voice controls other than echo. Unfortunately, as soon as the return window closed, the volume knob stopped working. She wanted to also use the CD player to listen to books on CD from the library in the evenings to fall asleep to. Now the volume is permanently stuck on the maximum setting and that is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Works great, paired easily with my daughters tablet
customer_reviews.text: Works great, paired easily with my daughters tablet. Now she can search YouTube for just about any song she wants with lyrics, no need to buy karaoke discs or anything like that. She loves the lights and the sound quality is great for a machine in this price range. Wish it came with two microphones but you can buy a second for less than $10 on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dave K.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This machine didn't last very long with my four grandchildren. They had only used it a few times and the sound started coming and going and the microphones only worked some of the time. Unfortunately, by the time it quit working completely I couldn't send it back. Not a good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Murray

customer_reviews.title: NO POWER CORD!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got delivered today. Came with NO POWER CORD! Please recitfy this immediately
customer_reviews.author: Amirica

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return, lights are great and that's it. I had the same problem many reviews said they had. Lots of sound issues. Mic wouldn't work. The plug in to hook up another device didn't work. You're better off spending more for something better. I went against my better judgment and the reviews and bought it and the return process is always a hassle!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is not what's pictured!!
customer_reviews.text: I received my karaoke machine today, took immediately out of the box to inspect the plug and to my dismay it was not hard wired into the machine as shone. It was a separated adapter. Why does it matter?? Well by reading so many review about how the adapter port breaks and basically falls inside the machine rendering it useless, i decided that would be one reason i would not want that model. Well its going right back, didn't even try it out .....also I expected it to be more substantial in weight....but it was junky.
customer_reviews.author: Ladygrace64

customer_reviews.title: Not the best online purchase I've made
customer_reviews.text: This karaoke machine is pretty temperamental. The volume is hard to control and is pretty poor quality. I bought for my 9 year old daughter and she likes it, but gets frustrated at how often it malfunctions. The disco lights are pretty cute. I've had this for about a month now and basically the only thing that still works are the disco lights. The volume no longer works, the microphone makes no sound and most of the cds I put in this machine don't play. We have kept this in the corner of our living room, so these problems are not due to us dropping it or mishandling it. I would not recommend this to anyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever. My daughter and her friends have had hours and hours of fun using this machine. It is simple to hook up using the RCA jacks. The sound quality is very good and the music sounds great coming from the speaker. The flashing lights are a cool touch. If you buy this machine you will also want to buy a second mic for it and purchase more cd's which can be a pain because it seems like most of the cd's have the same songs on them . Overall we are very happy with this purchase and would recommend it to anyone who wants an inexpensive karaoke machine int he house for their children to play with.
customer_reviews.author: PFT

customer_reviews.title: Quiet Microphone and USB doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother, the microphone is too quiet, and the USB doesn't work at all. I put in a thumb drive with music on it and the screen just blinks --- and no music every plays. I'll be returning this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Microphone Lasted 3 Days
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it at first. But the microphone stopped working on day 3. I purchased another microphone for her but am disappointed the original microphone didn't last longer. Update: The machine's audio completely stopped working less than 6 months after purchasing. It still lights up and says the CD is playing but you can't hear a thing. Definitely not worth the money. Just spend more on a higher quality machine that will actually work.
customer_reviews.author: BnK

customer_reviews.title: Good features/price, but poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I really really really want to like this product, good price for all the features it has. However, just sent the 2nd one back after exchanging the first one that had a defective switch for the light control. The 2nd one had an intermittent defective microphone and it was also causing feedback from the speaker (which didn’t happen with the first machine). I’m not expecting high quality for the price, but maybe a little better quality for a little more money would be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: LACyclist

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift and during the first use, the microphone stopped working. After turning it off for a while, the mic seemed to be fine again, but then stopped mid-song in the next use as well. A second mic also failed to work. Both microphones were tested on another older speaker system and worked fine. The machine did not work with any other microphone tested (4 others), though every mic used worked fine on other karaoke machines and on the separate stereo tuner. Customer service did nothing with the request and has failed to respond for weeks. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Best gift this year
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 6 year old granddaughter for her birthday. She loves to sing and now loves the lights and effects. This machine is well made and is going to give her a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: gma

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't shipped properly.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the fact it looked like it had been previously opened. I did not pay for an out of box item. It also was not box so no protection. Shipped just like took off shelf and slapped a shipping label on it. Of course the box is beat up. I hope it works cause it is for a 5 year old birthday on 29 of July. So if it doesn't I am screwed cause return date is July 29.
customer_reviews.author: patricia delaney

customer_reviews.title: What I expected for the money
customer_reviews.text: My kids enjoy it. It's sufficiently loud and the lights are fun. The microphone started cutting in and out when the cord would move soon after buying it which is pretty frustrating considering little kids don't have the patience for that kind of thing. Fortunately, I bought a second microphone but the one it came with isn't consistently working. Instead of connecting this to my TV and buying karaoke CD's, I just set it up next to my TV and use my Roku to pull up karaoke songs on YouTube for free.
customer_reviews.author: FunkHouse9

customer_reviews.title: The a/c port in the back is flimsy and broke
customer_reviews.text: Like many reviews have stated, the a/c port breaks. Had it less than 6 months before it totally broke off. Amazon customer service is of no help and it’s pass the 30day manufacturer guarantee. Don’t buy, it’s made so cheaply.
customer_reviews.author: Pos karaoke machine

customer_reviews.title: Partytime Music at Home
customer_reviews.text: We have only used this one week, but it was great. The microphone that came with it worked fine, but I had another one I ordered at the same time so 2 kids could use this, worked even better. I hope it holds up and continues to work like it is now. Kids used it without the CDs for a loud speaker a lot of the time. If you don't enjoy music and a lot of laughter be careful of ordering this machine. We had a lot of giggles and laughter. I am glad I ordered this.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Similar to sets in retail stores usually a little cheaper on amazon
customer_reviews.text: I created a custom USB to DC barrel adapter cable and run this thing off a USB power bank. The kids love it! I also got the second mic (a must if you have 2 kids or 1 kid and you want to sing with them) The girls love the pulsating lights and the ability to adjust the intensity. The composite output to the television and the RCA jacks to the stereo mean we can really crank up the volume and have a karaoke party with the big TV and stereo set! Update: we got this back in 2017 (Christmas) and ours is going strong... CD-G video for the words and everything still work great. Kids still love it!
customer_reviews.author: david1024

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product ...defective defective defective
customer_reviews.text: Can I just say what a useless piece this thing is. Tried to play a CDG and it couldn't get through one song without freezing up and we have to reset and power down. It has happened Everytime we tried playing a CDG. Do not buy this product. It is a waste of time, money, and effort to buy, install, and return. We tried turning on the disco lights and running the CDG, it froze and we had to power down and reset. Just awful
customer_reviews.author: Nabby258

customer_reviews.title: Get a better product!
customer_reviews.text: This was an exchange for a defective unit. The original unit was packaged well, with individual parts in their own bags. No microphones registered. Returned. The exchange unit came in a torn box with all of the smaller accessories out of their original bags, nothing twist tied. Appears it was returned prior. The power adapter plug is loose. No power to the unit when plugged in. Poor design. Terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Jane M.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for this kids (until it breaks)
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love this karaoke machine, especially our newly-minted four-year old who can't stop singing. I am giving only three stars, however, as we purchased the same unit (although in black) 18 months ago, and it broke within the first few months of use. Albeit, that use was largely without parental supervision, but I would appreciate a more reliable unit that could withstand kiddos use. Hoping our second version will have a longer shelf life.
customer_reviews.author: kerryoc

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this. Sound is good. Lights are awesome. The only thing I don’t like very much is whatever you are Bluetooth from it has to be close to the machine. So if I Bluetooth from my phone and then forget and walk in the other room with my phone it cuts out some. But it’s not a big deal. This machine is a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: She

customer_reviews.title: Not good/add on
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to add onto this review. Unfortunately when my son attempted to use it the cd would not play and the cd function didn’t work at all. The only thing this machine was good for is a light show. The first issue was the item arrived with no microphone or power adapter. The company sent a replacement, but now the lights continuously blink instead of giving you the options of changing them and the volume is so low you can’t hear it. I’d say purchase in store to try one out before buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trash/Waste of $$$
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I got the lemon but this worked for a couple weeks then the cheap input jacks both failed. Now the mics won't work. My own fault I wasn't quick enough and now return window is closed. Would not recommended. UPDATE: After some manufacturer sent a new one. Its works great.
customer_reviews.author: JESSE

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in a year
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. The dc connection port became lose within a year. No way to tighten it as it is held together by particle board in the back. No maintenance department through the company and the warranty only covers issues for 90 days. I called to see if I could get a replacement as we have barely used it in a year, maybe 20 times and they said they can't help me. They suggested I seek a local repairman. I am guessing that would cost me more than the machine is worth. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Keri D.

customer_reviews.title: Beware power cable port
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one of these for a birthday gift for a friend. The kids had so much fun with it so we decided to get one for use as well. Within 2 weeks, the spot you plug the power cord into the back nearly fell out. We had only unplugged and moved it maybe 2 or 3 times. So we carefully pushed it back into place and now it wont turn on at all. I quickly requested an exchange and we are eagerly awaiting our new one. My girls (aged 7 and 2) love to sing their hearts out on it. I hope this one will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi Morrow

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This made my 4 and 6 year olds Christmas! They loved this so much. The lights are wonderful added feature and the mic included is nice. Highly recommend this purchase! And it's the best price too!
customer_reviews.author: Na'Tasha Nettles

customer_reviews.title: Power cord issue, DONT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had believed all the negative reviews , in just a few months we had the same problem as almost everyone does, the power cord is loose inside and won’t work😕the company only has a 90 Day warranty -imagine that!!! If I could give it a negative # I would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Delivered broken. The disc reader gave an "OP" error. Googled it and that's a common error with this machine and it means the door to the disc drive is open. The door to the disc drive doesn't click to close or latch, it just sets down. The player would play one song and then I'd get the error. Called the 800 number and they said it's defective and to send it back. Just annoying.
customer_reviews.author: sammama

customer_reviews.title: Wish it worked properly.
customer_reviews.text: Neither my husband or myself can get this thing to hook up Bluetooth to anything and it's getting very frustrating. This was supposed to be a birthday present for my daughter for her 6th birthday however she cannot connect it to her Kindle or I can't get it to my phone It is been a big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, poor microphone
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for a 9 year old who loves to sing. I would give this product a 5 star but it was rather difficult to set up an account and download music from the singing machine website. Plus you have to pay for each song you want to download. We found it much easier to just hookup our ipad and play songs for free off of youtube. We also had to buy a new microphone because this one did not work. It kept fading in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great item. Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Very cute. Grandson loves it. Was a little upset with how the item was shipped. I thought that the item would be in a nice colorful box showing what it looked like. Like a description on the box. But it didn’t. It came in a regular shipping box. When I opened the box. The item was just sitting in the cardboard box it was shipped in. Had to open the whole box to see what was in there. But for the most part, I feel it was a great deal and my grandson loved it so that’s all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: christine fenton

customer_reviews.title: works great but songs are expensive
customer_reviews.text: It comes with 1 CD which is nice. If you want any other songs it will cost you $1.99 per song after that. The website that you sign up on has many songs but it will only play 40 seconds of the song. This will be very expensive if you want a nice collection of Karaoke songs. I can't get the TV to stream the song from the phone when hooked up to the Karaoke machine. Otherwise you could just play song from you tube that have lyrics, on your phone. But then you have to look at the phone not the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Foremar

customer_reviews.title: Please Read
customer_reviews.text: We all love this karaoke machine. New Years Eve, our 4 children and my husband and I stayed home using this to have our own party. It was so much fun. We have created many memories for not only ourselves but our children as well. We all had a great time. The quality is great and you can set it up to every device. I would definitely buy it again, and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Faith M

customer_reviews.title: I returned this item. The original box was ripped ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item. The original box was ripped open so they put it inside an amazon box . The thing was missing the ac adapter that was supposed to come with it. My husband went to buy one but the thing wouldn't work properly. When we turned it on all we heard was the static. The CD player did not play, the microphone didn't work the Disco lights were very dim
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my little performer!
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a gift for my daughter's 4th birthday. It lights up, which is super cool and she has a great time singing along to her favorite Disney songs on it. It was super easy to use and set up with our TV so we could see the words. It doesn't turn up super loud, which is a bonus for this overstimulated mama. I want to get a second mic so we can have even more fun! This is the perfect little machine for a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Mama L

customer_reviews.title: It was a great price for us and does everything we need it ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter. She loves it! It was a great price for us and does everything we need it to. I was a little bummed that it doesn't have a screen to read the words, but then I discovered that it comes with a cord to hook up to your tv so that you can just use your tv to follow the words.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Sent used machine with missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson's birthday. When he opened it on his birthday he was excited until we found out the microphone was missing along with the AC power adapter, the RCA output jacks and an instruction manual plus the machine was scratched. This was advertised as new, but was obviously a return and no one bothered to check the box to see if all the parts were there. There's nothing worse than having a disappointed child on their birthday. Returning for a refund and will purchase somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: csi shopper

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for Christmas and the microphone just stopped working ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Christmas and the microphone just stopped working feb 3 can't return it because return window ended Jan 31. Only used it maybe five times. Awful product!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C.

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart - Singing Machine SML385BTW Top Loading CDG Karaoke System with Bluetooth, Sound and Disco Light Show
customer_reviews.text: This Singing Machine SML385BTW Top Loading CDG Karaoke System with Bluetooth, Sound and Disco Light Show sold by Amazon is a BIG waste of my money. Fell apart after a few weeks of use by a 11 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs better  volume control options
customer_reviews.text: Decent kids karaoke machine for the price it’s all good except I wish you could turn up the microphone louder than the music. Upping the volume seems to increase both the music and mic together. It’s nice to turn down the music more so you can hear your voice better. This is our first machine so it was a new preference I hadn’t considered before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the value
customer_reviews.text: Mic. Doesn't work real well. But overall not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: davchillymau

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my granddaughter for Christmas. The plug ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter for Christmas. The plug where the transformer connects just randomly fell out. It can't be fixed. Won't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Emeny

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product as a gift for my daughter. As it was being sold as new in box, we just wrapped it without opening it. When I finally got the chance to see my daughter and give her this gift, this year for her birthday, the contents were all unpackaged, the power cord was plugged into the unit, and it worked for about 3 minutes. Again, I take responsibility for this not being returned, but I did buy it as a "NEW" unit. I saw no point in opening it to make sure it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: can barely hear it
customer_reviews.text: I will start buy something else the machine didn't even come with with a a cd. they want you to install their lame app to play but the track volume is o low you can hear it. I wish the would've include a disc many is bette but I honestly don't think so. spend a little more and get something else
customer_reviews.author: Jackoutofthebox

customer_reviews.title: A Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive but good for the grandkids to play with. It works well and has held up for several years to 4 grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed! I should have believed the reviews
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! I should have believed the reviews. We ordered a replacement after the first one had no bass sound. The second one seems to work great till just yesterday, a day short of a month after starting to use it (but beyond the month return policy on Amazon based on date of purchase). The CD player stopped working and won't recognize when a disk is inserted. Over a month, it has been used sporadically but not excessively. Don't waste your money. :(
customer_reviews.author: Story Hour

customer_reviews.title: WOULD NOT EVEN POWER ON
customer_reviews.text: so we bought this for my daughter at thanksgiving as it was on sale to put away for her birthday well shame on me for not opening the box to see if it worked! we gave it to her last week as her birthday gift and the machine does not even power on, we contacted the information provided to trouble shoot and they were unable to help as it would not even power on! I am not left out of pocket with a machine that never worked as it is passed the return date! note to self buy at costco next time as they will always let you return
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine !
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. My daughter got this for Christmas and we all had a little jam session last night. Even the adults were getting in there. The sound quality is really great and I love the colors this thing produces. It's a really fun karaoke machine that we will enjoy for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Y

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a little kid.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters 8th birthday. She absolutely loves it. I was shocked at how light it was, but I guess that's not a bad thing since she moves it around so much. It sounds like the sound sometimes gets louder and softer when it wants to but overall it's a fun machine for a kid to jam out with.
customer_reviews.author: Holly D.

customer_reviews.title: Sound and Microphone are awful
customer_reviews.text: Please only buy this is you have little kids, otherwise the sound and microphone sounds are primitive. I can't believe this was rated so highly on Amazon? Seriously the most disappointed buy I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A Everhart

product_meta.title: Singing Machine SML385UW Bluetooth Karaoke System with LED Disco Lights, CD+G, USB, and Microphone, White
product_meta.description: Configuration:White USBHost a dance party with the SML385UW Singing Machine Bluetooth Karaoke system featuring a top loading CD player that plays music CDs and CD + Graphics. Wirelessly stream digital audio from any Bluetooth compatible device or plug in your USB to listen to your favorite jam or to record your performance! Hi-Fi LED disco lights effect set the perfect party ambience.
feature_bullets: Top loading CD player plays music CDs plus CD + Graphics
Bluetooth for wireless digital audio streaming from compatible devices
Usb connectivity to record your performance or to play your saved songs
54 LED disco lights with dimmer setting lets you control the party ambience
2-Digital LED display lets you know your song track. Echo control for voice effects
Built-in speaker in wood cabinet provides powerful sound
RCAL cables connect to your television set for Scrolling lyrics for instant plug and play fun (TV Not included)
Line-in to connect to other audio devices (sold separately)
Sing a duet with two wired microphone jacks with separate volume controls

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars5,094 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
